Question
========

Which of the following scikit-learn models is/are typically used for regression 
problems (not classification)?

Answerlist
----------

* Decision Tree Regression
* Logistic Regression
* Linear Regression
* Naive Bayes

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* This is a model for performing binary classification.
* Correct.
* This is used for classification.
